W. K. KELLOGG FOUNDATION
250 CHAMPION STREET
BATTLE CREEK, MICHIGAN
DIVISION OF EDUCATION
MAURICE F. SEAY
DIRECTOR
June 26, 1959
PHONE WO s-ai
Dr. Harry J. Skornia, Exec. Director
National Ass’n. of Educational Broadcasters
University of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Harry:
Our Foundation check for $4-2,738*00 made payable to the National
Association of Educational Broadcasters, Inc. is enclosed. This
check represents our payment for the first year of our new pro¬
ject.
No press release concerning this new commitment to the NAEB will
he made by this Foundation. We would be glad, however, for you
to issue any announcement concerning it which you think appro¬
priate. In case you do this, we would appreciate receiving a
copy in advance so that we might have the opportunity of making
suggestions.
Sincerely and with best wishes.
Maurice F. Seay
MFS/fh
enc.
P.S.: According to the revised budget for your project, which
we approved in our letter of June 2, 1959, you were to receive
as your first payment $42,738.40. In order to simplify account¬
ing procedures we have not included in our payment the 40^.
